entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:54 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:54 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
